item.title: Name of the work 2
item.description: When she reached the first hills of the Italic Mountains, she had a last view back on the skyline of her hometown Bookmarksgrove, the headline of Alphabet Village and the subline of her own road, the Line Lane.

item.title: Item without image
item.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.

item.title: Muscles
item.description: Without our muscles, we couldn’t move. We couldn’t eat, we couldn’t talk, we couldn’t even breathe. Our heart would not work because the heart is a muscle, too. All of these things require a movement. We control some of the muscles but some just keep going, like the heart, or the breathing process. Our stomach would not be able to digest the food we eat. Did you know there are three types of muscles?

item.title: Weird Things
item.description: There could be a lot of weird things just lying around your house. Take a closer look at all of them. You can add some weird things to this article when you finish reading it. Weird Thing #1 These are two carrots that grew together. They twisted around each other and grew together at the top. You can take the two twisted parts apart but you can never take it apart into two twisty carrots because, as I already said, they grew together at the top.

item.title: Fastfins
item.description: Fastfins are not afraid of eels. Normally, all dragons are afraid of eels but not fastfins. However, Summer is a fastfin and she is afraid of eels. Why? When she was little, she was playing with her friends in an ocean. Her friends swam away and when she turned to follow, there was an eel and it bit her. And that is why Summer is afraid of eels. (When my dad was little, a rooster attacked him and then for a long time, he was afraid of any birds that came near him.

item.title: Rescue Riders
item.description: Rescue Riders are a team of two people and five dragons. The people ride on the dragons and rescue people and dragons but mostly people. Here you learn more about them. Versions of Leyla’s Dragon Diary Hedvika’s Dragon Diary: Go to the diary Filip’s Dragon Diary: Watch the video Movies Rescue Riders have two seasons and also the following movie specials: Hunt for the Golden Dragon Trailer: Secrets of the Songwing Trailer: Songs:

item.title: Fossils
item.description: Here are two fossils from my collection. Fossil 1 This fossil is about 145 million years old. It is from the early Cretaceous Period. It is older than a Tyranosaurus Rex who lived in the Late Cretaceous Time Period. The Triassic, Jurassic, and Cretaceous Periods are all parts of the Mezozoic Era, also called the age of dinosaurs. This fossil is a pelecypod and it is sometimes called Devil’s Toenail. It is a kind of oyster.

item.title: Name of the work 1
item.description: Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life. One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar.

item.title: Fire Furies
item.description: When two or more Fire Furies shoot the biggest fireball they can at the same time into the air and the fireballs crash together, it makes a big explosion that looks like fireworks. For example, in Furious Fun (Season 1, Episode 12), Aggro, Laburn, and Cinda make a huge firework. Go back to Hedvika’s Dragon Diary

item.title: Golden Dragons
item.description: Golden Dragons are legendary. They lay an egg only once every 100 years. Golden Dragons can shoot streams of golden glitter. The glitter is hard to get off once it sticks and you definitely don’t want to get it in your eyes. Gemma appears in the special Hunt for the Golden Dragon. Go back to Hedvika’s Dragon Diary

item.title: Relentless Razorwings
item.description: Relentless Razorwings are known for having awesome eye sight. They can find basically anything, even a needle in a haystack. (For example, in Secrets of the Songwing, Cutter finds Aggro on an island far away.) Go back to Hedvika’s Dragon Diary

item.title: Swiftwings
item.description: Swiftwings are the fastest dragons on the planet. They are so fast that if they came to Earth, they would fly faster than a peregrine falcon. They would be faster than a mole on a motorbike. They are great at flying tricks. They have three powerblasts and when they are old enough, they can have one megablast. For example, in Grumblegard Part 2 (Season 1, Episode 14), Winger defeats the Slinkwings with a megablast.
